pages.text: Seems you're having bad time dealing with steam/water transportation, pipe is your only solution.$(br2)    Pipes are able to hold amount of single fluid and transport it, here's how it work:

$(li)Every tick pipe will try transfer fluid into nearby pipes/machines if nearby pipes/machines' fluid container is not full and have lesser fluid amount.$(li)Steam is the only fluid that can manually flows into nearby upward pipe, to transport non-steam fluid, pump it!$(li)NOTE: Wooden pipe will might break if it's holding steam or lava in 1/1000000.$(li)You cannot change connection of pipe manually at this moment, consider avoid compacting.
